features.featureTitle: Update the Share dialog to temporarily remove/disable the QR code feature while keeping the rest of the dialog functionality unchanged (App Link display, Copy Link, and Quick Share). Specifically: remove QR canvas rendering and the QR generation hook usage; remove or disable the “Download QR” action; and update the dialog description/tip text so it no longer instructs users to scan a QR code and instead directs them to share via the app link.

Update the Flyer experience to temporarily remove/disable QR code generation and rendering, while keeping the flyer page usable and downloadable. Specifically: remove the QR canvas from the flyer preview UI, remove QR generation state handling (ready/generating/error gating), and adjust the flyer export implementation so it can export a flyer PNG without requiring a QR canvas (the exported flyer should still include the app title/branding and the share URL).
